title: Communal BBQ area (with rotisserie feature), On-Site Bicycle Parking
posting_body: 1120 S. Grand Ave, Los Angeles, CA, 90015
Visit This Website to See More:
This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 460 Sq.

Located in Downtown LA, the electrifying buzz of the city runs through AVEN as the center of a flourishing community; alive with cutting-edge eateries, world-class musicians, pioneering fashion, and talented artists.
With a clear view of the beaming Hollywood sign, at AVEN you know you live above it all.
Designed with Thoughtful Living™ in mind, AVEN was crafted to accommodate all considerations of how you want to live.
The residences and community spaces perfectly blend indoor and outdoor living through warm modern interiors complemented by unexpected outdoor retreats.
Every inch is crafted to bring harmonious balance into your life.
By introducing AVEN’s public park to the neighborhood, we finally brought the “park” to South Park.
